module.name: Voicemail Reports
module.description: Displays various information related to the voicemail system.
module.changelog: *13.0.13.1* Internal fixes *13.0.13* PHP 5.6 Updates *13.0.12* Update Language *13.0.11* FREEPBX-12302 add export to voicemails table *13.0.10* FREEPBX-11905 push unixtime to grid *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10571 remove repeat add restart button to player *13.0.8* FREEPBX-11290 Fix handling of virtual extensions *13.0.7* FREEPBX-11308 Indicate am/pm *13.0.6* Remove en_US Translations *13.0.5* FREEPBX-11191 *13.0.4* FREEPBX-11010 every file clicked for playback was essentially wrong *13.0.3* HTML5 playback *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes *12.0.3* Fix temporary greeting location *12.0.1* Zend compatibility fixes 2.11.0.9 Fix wording on view FREEPBX-8327 2.11.0.8 Tag the Repo Correctly 2.11.0.7 Fix issue with max_execution_time when system has a lot of voicemails 2.11.0.5 FREEPBX-6101 String to Int PHP Conversion errors 2.11.0.4 Fix text stating save was possible 2.11.0.3 Fix issue where play wouldn't work after sorting columns 2.11.0.2 fix missing image 2.11.0.1 Bump for 2.11 2.10.0.6 Packaging of ver 2.10.0.6
